# thumbTintColor

**Instance Property**

The color used to tint the appearance of the thumb.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var thumbTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

## Customizing the appearance of the switch

- **onTintColor**: The color used to tint the appearance of the switch when it’s in the on position.
